acceptOwner().details: Can only be called by the pending owner to ensure correctness. Calls to the `_beforeAcceptOwner` hook      to perform logic before updating ownership.

commit(bytes32[],uint256,bytes).details: Accepts both requested and non-requested versions.      Requested versions will pay out a keeper fee, non-requested versions will not.      Accepts any publish time in the underlying price message, as long as it is within the validity window,      which means its possible for publish times to be slightly out of order with respect to versions.      Batched updates are supported by passing in a list of price feed ids along with a valid batch update data.

params.oracleIds: The list of price feed ids to commit

params.oracleId: The id of the oracle to create
params.payoff: The payoff provider for the oracle
params.underlyingId: The underlying id of the oracle to create

current().details: Rounded up to the nearest granularity

factoryType().details: Uses's OZ's short string storage util (only available in newer versions of oz/contracts)      https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/master/contracts/utils/ShortStrings.sol

pause().details: Can only be called by the pauser

settle(bytes32[],uint256[],uint256[]).details: Pays out a keeper incentive if all supplied local settlement callbacks succeed      Each array must be the same length, each index is a separate corresponding callback entry

params.maxCounts: The list of maximum number of settlement callbacks to perform before exiting
params.oracleIds: The list of price feed ids to settle
params.versions: The list of versions to settle

unpause().details: Can only be called by the pauser

params.newGranularity: The new granularity value in seconds
params.newOraclefee: The new relative oracle fee percentage
params.newValidFrom: The new valid from value in seconds
params.newValidTo: The new valid to value in seconds

updatePauser(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner

updatePendingOwner(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner      New owner does not take affect until that address calls `acceptOwner()`

acceptOwner().notice: Accepts and transfers the ownership of the contract to the pending owner

commit(bytes32[],uint256,bytes).notice: Commits the price to specified version

ids(address).notice: Mapping of oracle instance to oracle id

instances(address).notice: Returns whether the instance is valid

register(address).notice: Authorizes a factory's instances to request from this factory's instances

settle(bytes32[],uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Performs a list of local settlement callbacks

toUnderlyingPayoff(bytes32).notice: Returns the payoff definition for the specified id

updateId(address,bytes32).notice: Retroactively sets the mapping of the oracle id to the oracle instance
